name: Impress Me With Chemistry
description:
Made for the I Love Science Game Jam 2022.

As host, I requested a theme that I could follow that was chosen by another. This theme was 'reactions.'

Official theme: 'Frequency.'

This mini-educational game is designed to act as a study tool for high school students to help with their chemistry studies.

Next update: I'll actually put the answers in ;) 

Assets

https://pzuh.itch.io/adventurer-girl-free-sprites

https://maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern

https://maaot.itch.io/2d-browncave-assets

Speech bubbles - Vecteezy

Font - DynaPuff
